PreceptDef.label: abhorrent (strict)
PreceptDef.description:
Strive for peace within yourself. Refuse to retaliate in the face of provocation and violence. Persevere in nonviolence of tongue and heart.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - All persons joining this ideoligion will take a solemn nonviolence vow.
 - The only mental break allowed is psychotic wander.
 - Colonists will receive negative mood if ANY human casualties take place on the colony.

li.label: someone died
li.description: The grim reality of death reminds us that this world is a cruel place, and makes us believe more firmly in our path of nonviolence.
